about_the_game:
Zombieville USA 3D is a light-hearted action romp, combining classic arcade action with modern visuals and a dash of roguelite fun.

Play solo or with friends as you scavenge for weapons, unlock skills, and see how long you can survive before you become a midnight snack for the living dead! Whether you played the original Zombieville USA over 15 years ago, or this is your first foray into the zombie-filled suburbs, we hope you’ll enjoy your stay!

Features


  • An arsenal of 38 weapons to unlock, from machine guns and shotguns, to chainsaws, rockets, energy weapons, flamethrowers, and katanas. You name it, we probably got it.

  • 24 unlockable "perks" to level up, customizing your playstyle. Specialize in melee weapons, explosives, whatever floats your boat.

  • Randomly generated weapons with unique traits keep every run unpredictable

  • Infinitely scaling difficulty - go for your high score before the living dead overwhelm you!

  • Spectacular stylized 3D visuals.

  • Play solo or with online co-op for 3 players.

  • Designed to play great with a gamepad, but feels right at home with mouse and keyboard as well.

Follow us on Twitter @MikaMobile to stay up to date on all developments. Thank you for your patience as we work towards release!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features large amounts of cartoon violence.

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Q6867
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run well on a wide variety of hardware - at medium settings with FXAA, we've observed 60-80+ FPS on a Steam Deck.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Zombieville USA 3D is a stylized arcade shooter combining retro gameplay with strikingly polished visuals. Fight through an endless undead horde in the bleak hellscape of suburbia! Choose your weapons, grab a friend, and see how long you can survive.
